task.title: Viewing queues by using the command line
task.shortdesc: System administrators can view queues by using the show, and list commands on the command line.

context.p: You can view a queue by using the command line, or by using the . For more information about using the to view a queue, see .
context.note: The commands must be capitalized as shown.

step.cmd: To view a list of all queues, enter the following command:
To view the configuration of a specific queue, enter the following command:

info.p:
Where:
Qname Specifies the name of the queue you want to view.

example.p: The following example shows the details of a specific queue, testQ: show Queue "Name=testQ" Name = testQ AllowSend = False ConcurrentConsumers = True MaxMessages = 1000
